0.text: Bug 133096  Mapping of ODA data type literal value to code value.

1.text: The ODA dataSource extension point specifies an ODA scalar data type in its literal value.

2.text: But most handling of an ODA data type in the ODA framework is done with its code value.

3.text: The oda.util.manifest package should provide the conversion utility to map from an  ODA literal value to its corresponding code value.

4.text: Another issue is with the native data type code.

5.text: If a native data type is unknown, a 0 value has been used to represent "unknown" value.

6.text: The latest implementation in the ODA design-time framework should be consistent with the definition.
